title: Socio-economic and cultural dataset for Energy Efficiency
description: The questionnaire is provided in pdf GreenSoul_Questionnaire.pdf The coded data from 303 interviewees is provided in all_code_final_zenodo.xlsx The dataset is composed of several factors which are all explained in different TXT files. * socio-economic_description_not_dependent_of_work.txt - Contains all the information from participants which is irrespective of their current workplace. This file contains typical socio-demographic and cultural attributes from respondents. * socio-economic_description_dependent_of_work.txt - Contains socio-economic and cultural information from participants which is relevant to the workplace in relation to energy efficient practices in such an environment. * actions-at-work.txt - Are a set of attributes which describe certain practices of employees in relation to energy efficiency. * persuasive_strategies.txt - Explain the ratings from 1 to 5 that participants attributed to a set of persuasive strategies. These strategies are framed within Psychological Persuasive principles which are also explained in the file. * all_attributes_together.txt - All the variables together without distinction of the environment where they are applicable. Finally, plots from every construct or attribute are provided in the files uploaded in PNG extension
